    • Method Detail

      • isBeaconInRegion

        public static boolean isBeaconInRegion(Beacon beacon,
                                       BeaconRegion beaconRegion)
        Returns true if beacon matches the region. That is region's location UUID, major, minor matches beacon's ones. Or if region uses wildcard for any of those properties.

      • computeAccuracy

        public static double computeAccuracy(Beacon beacon)
        Returns distance in meters based on beacon's RSSI and measured transmitPower. Returns -1 when cannot compute accuracy.

      • computeAccuracy

        public static double computeAccuracy(Eddystone eddystone)

      • computeAccuracy

        public static double computeAccuracy(EstimoteLocation location)

      • computeAccuracy

        public static double computeAccuracy(int rssi,
                                     int measuredPower)

      • proximityFromAccuracy

        public static Proximity proximityFromAccuracy(double accuracy)
        Computes Proximity based on distance in meters. Current distance ranges:
        • immediate: 0 - 0.5m
        • near: 0.5m - 3.0m
        • far: 3.0m - ...
        Parameters:
        accuracy - Distance in meters.
        Returns:
        Location between device and beacon.

      • computeProximity

        public static Proximity computeProximity(Beacon beacon)

      • computeProximity

        public static Proximity computeProximity(Nearable nearable)

      • parseInt

        public static int parseInt(java.lang.String numberAsString)
        Parses string to integer. If string cannot be parsed, returns 0.
        Parameters:
        numberAsString - String to be parsed.
        Returns:
        Integer value or 0 if string cannot be parsed.
